dailyRoutine.title: Daily Dental Care Routine
dailyRoutine.description: Maintaining good oral hygiene is essential for your dental health. A proper daily routine helps prevent cavities and gum disease.

tips.title: Essential Oral Hygiene Tips
list: Brush your teeth twice a day with fluoride toothpaste
Floss daily to clean between teeth

overview.title: What are Dental Implants?
overview.description: Dental implants are titanium posts that serve as artificial tooth roots, providing a permanent foundation for replacement teeth. This modern solution offers a long-lasting alternative that looks, feels, and functions just like natural teeth, helping restore both your smile and confidence.

benefits.title: Benefits of Dental Implants
list: Natural appearance and functionality identical to real teeth
Preserves jawbone health and facial structure
Enhanced speech clarity and eating comfort
Unrestricted diet - enjoy all your favorite foods
Improved self-confidence and quality of life

process.title: Implant Process
process.description: The dental implant process is a well-planned journey to your new smile, typically completed in several phases to ensure optimal results.
steps: Comprehensive evaluation and personalized treatment planning
Precise implant placement using advanced surgical techniques

preventive.title: Preventive Care
preventive.description: Regular preventive care is essential for maintaining optimal oral health and preventing dental problems before they start.

restorative.title: Restorative Treatments
restorative.description: When dental problems occur, we offer a range of restorative procedures to repair damage and restore your oral health.

overview.title: Understanding All-on-X
overview.description: All-on-X is an innovative full-arch dental implant solution that provides a permanent replacement for all teeth using just 4-6 strategically placed implants.

advantages.title: Advantages of All-on-X
list: Fewer implants needed compared to traditional approaches

candidates.title: Is All-on-X Right for You?
candidates.description: All-on-X is ideal for patients who have lost or are about to lose all their teeth in either the upper or lower jaw. It's also suitable for those who want to replace unstable dentures with a fixed solution.

about.pageDescription: Learn about Herbie Dental Clinic and our commitment to exceptional dental care
about.title: About Herbie Dental
about.subtitle: Providing exceptional dental care with expertise and compassion

founder.subtitle: ABOUT.FOUNDER.SUBTITLE
founder.name: Dr. Yurii Herbei
founder.description: With over 5 years of specialized experience in oral surgery and orthopedics, Dr. Herbei is committed to providing the highest quality dental care. His expertise in modern dental techniques and dedication to patient comfort has established Herbie Dental as a trusted name in dental healthcare.
